testcase.classname: I want to create po for the process
testcase.name: Revising the valid PO in PO Master Screen
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then Click on Fabric sourcing module........................................passed And click on Data Entry in fabric sourcing module...........................passed And click on Generate PO....................................................passed And click on PO Master Sheet................................................passed Given Search with IPO in search keyword textbox.............................passed When click on filter icon on grid and search with the process name..........passed And click on revise po icon.................................................passed And navigated to revise po screen and displaying the update form or not.....passed Then update the data and submit the revise po...............................passed
